result.reason: Folders (Containers) hide protocol-specific properties (like RDP/SSH settings) in the Config panel because they don't have a protocol set, preventing users from setting these values for inheritance. The fix is to bypass the protocol check for Containers.
result.approach: Modify 'ShowHideGridItems' in 'ConnectionInfoPropertyGrid.cs' to pass 'IsShowingInheritance || info.IsContainer' as the 'skipProtocolCheck' argument to 'IsValidForProtocol', ensuring all browsable properties are visible for Folders.
